                Johnny Mad Dog (2008) Film
[_________________________________________________________]
Johnny Mad Dog follows a group of LURD child soldiers fighting in 2003, during the latter part of the Second Liberian Civil War. 
The actors are mostly aged 10 to 15. All were unknowns when cast; some were themselves child soldiers
The film follows their march towards the capital Monrovia, and follows them in a gritty realistic manner as they move 
through a series of towns and villages where they terrify and often execute the populace.
